name: Alice's Dolls
description:
The game that features Alice Margatroid and her dolls, Hourai and Shanghai from ZUN’s hit game, Touhou.

Tap the dolls! Tap the dolls of Alice before they may kill you!
A very simple game that is enjoyable.

Multiple game modes to be unlocked:
Endurance
Doll Trap
Time-Attack
Alice Tag

ENDURANCE
Tap as many dolls as you can within the time limit without tapping the traps.
Reach 1500 points to unlock Doll Trap.

DOLL TRAP
Find the unique doll hiding behind the trap dolls within the time limit.
Reach 700 points to unlock Time-Attack and Alice Tag.

TIME-ATTACK
Tap as many dolls as you can within your chosen time.

ALICE TAG
Tap as many dolls as you can within the time limit without tapping the traps. And tap Alice to get a BIG REWARD!
